source: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
reference: Op maandag kondigden wetenschappers van de Stanford University School of Medicine aan dat een nieuw diagnostisch hulpmiddel is uitgevonden dat cellen op type kan ordenen: een piepkleine af te drukken chip die voor waarschijnlijk ongeveer één dollarcent per stuk kan worden geproduceerd met behulp van standaard inkjetprinters.
translation: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.

source: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
reference: Hoofdonderzoekers zeggen dat dit kan leiden tot een vroege opsporing van kanker, tuberculose, HIV en malaria bij patiënten in arme landen. Hier zijn de overlevingskansen bij een aandoening als borstkanker de helft minder dan in rijke landen.
translation: Dutch: Leaders say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

source: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
reference: De JAS 39C Gripen stortte rond 09.30 uur lokale tijd (02.30 UTC) neer op de landingsbaan en ontplofte. De luchthaven is hierdoor gesloten voor commerciële vluchten.
translation: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.

source: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
reference: De piloot werd geïdentificeerd als majoor Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.

source: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
reference: De lokale media meldt dat er tijdens een actie op de luchthaven een brandweerwagen is gekanteld.
translation: Local media reports a fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

source: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
reference: De 28-jaar oude Vidal is drie seizoenen geleden van Sevilla naar Barça overgestapt.
translation: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.

source: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
reference: Sinds hij verhuisde naar de Catalaanse hoofdstad heeft hij 49 wedstrijden gespeeld voor de club.
translation: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal played 49 games for the club.

source: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
reference: Het protest begon rond 11.00 lokale tijd (UTC+1) op Whitehall, tegenover de door politie bewaakte ingang van Downing Street, de ambtswoning van de premier.
translation: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.

source: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
reference: Iets na 11.00 uur begonnen betogers het verkeer op de rijbaan in noordelijke richting in Whitehall te blokkeren.
translation: After 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.

source: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
reference: Om 11:20 vroeg de politie aan de demonstranten om weer op de stoep te gaan staan, waarbij zij het recht aanhaalde om het recht op protest af te wegen tegen het toenemende verkeer.
translation: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.

source: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
reference: Vanaf 11.29 uur verplaatsten de demonstranten zich richting Whitehall, langs Trafalgar Square, de Strand, Aldwych en Kingsway naar Holborn. Hier werd het Spring Forum van de Conservative Party gehouden in het hotel Grand Connaught Rooms.
translation: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

source: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
reference: Het onderlinge record van Nadal tegen de Canadees is 7-2.
translation: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.

source: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
reference: Eerder leed hij een nederlaag tegen Raonic in de Brisbane Open.
translation: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.

source: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
reference: Nadal won 88% van de netpunten in de wedstrijd, waardoor hij 76 punten behaalde in de eerste service.
translation: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.

source: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
reference: Na de wedstrijd zei De Gravelkoning, 'Ik ben gewoon blij dat ik weer in de laatste rondes van de belangrijkste wedstrijden sta. Ik ga dit proberen te winnen.'
translation: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."

source: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
reference: Het overkoepelde begrip de 'Panama Papers' verwijst naar de ongeveer tien miljoen documenten van het Panamese advocatenkantoor Mossack Fonseca die in de lente van 2016 naar de pers zijn gelekt.
translation: "Panama Papers" is a term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.

source: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
reference: Uit de documenten blijkt dat veertien banken rijke klanten hielpen bij het verbergen van miljarden Amerikaanse dollars aan rijkdommen om belastingen en andere regelgeving te omzeilen.
translation: Documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.

source: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
reference: Volgens de Britse krant The Guardian beheerde Deutsche Bank ongeveer een op de drie van de 1200 hierbij betrokken lege vennootschappen.
translation: Dutch newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.

source: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
reference: Er werd wereldwijd geprotesteerd, verschillende strafrechtelijke vervolgingen werden opgestart en de regeringsleiders van IJsland en Pakistan traden af.
translation: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.

source: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
reference: De in Hongkong geboren Ma studeerde aan de New York University en Harvard Law School en had ooit een Amerikaanse 'green card', een permanente verblijfsvergunning.
translation: Ma studied at the University of New York and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".

source: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
reference: Tijdens de verkiezingen liet Hsieh doorschemeren dat Ma gedurende een crisistijd het land zou kunnen ontvluchten.
translation: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.

source: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
reference: Volgens Hsieh was de fotogenieke Ma wel stijlvol, maar had ze niet zo bar veel inhoud.
translation: Hsieh also argued that Ma was more style than substance.

source: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
reference: Hoewel deze beschuldigingen werden geuit, won Ma eenvoudig op een platform dat zich hard maakte voor nauwere banden met het Chinese vasteland.
translation: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.

source: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
reference: De Speler van de Dag is Alex Ovechkin van de Washington Capitals.
translation: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.

source: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
reference: In de wedstrijd waarin Washington met 5-3 van de Atlanta Thrashers won, maakte hij 2 doelpunten en 2 assists.
translation: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.

source: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
reference: Ovechkins eerste assist van de avond was op het winnende doelpunt van debutant Nicklas Backstrom;
translation: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;

source: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
reference: Zijn tweede doelpunt van de avond was zijn 60ste van het seizoen. Hierdoor werd hij de eerste speler die sinds het seizoen van 1995-1996 zestig of meer doelpunten scoorde. In dat seizoen bereikten Jaromir Jagr en Mario Lemieux allebei die mijlpaal.
translation: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

source: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
reference: Batten stond in 2008 op plaats 190 op de lijst van de 400 rijkste Amerikanen met een geschat vermogen van 2,3 miljard dollar.
translation: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.

source: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
reference: In 1950 haalde hij een diploma aan het College of Arts & Sciences aan de universiteit van Virginia en later doneerde hij er veel geld aan.
translation: He graduated from the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to the University of Virginia.

source: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
reference: Bij een oproer staken mensen de Abu Ghraib-gevangenis in Irak in brand.
translation: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.

source: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
reference: De gevangenis werd berucht toen misbruik van gevangenen aan het licht kwam, nadat de Amerikaanse strijdkrachten het hadden overgenomen.
translation: The jail became notorious after the discovery of prisoner abuse there after US forces took over.

source: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
reference: Piquet Jr. crashte in de Grand Prix van Singapore in 2008, net nadat Fernando Alonso al vroeg een pitstop maakte, waarbij de safety car de baan opkwam.
translation: Dutch text: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.

source: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
reference: Terwijl de wagens vóór Alonso onder de safety car gingen bijtanken, nam hij de koppositie in om de overwinning te pakken.
translation: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.

source: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
reference: Piquet jr. werd in 2009 ontslagen na de Grand Prix van Hongarije.
translation: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

source: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
reference: Om precies 8.46 uur werd het doodstil in de stad. Dit was ook precies het moment waarop het eerste vliegtuig zijn doel raakte.
translation: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.

source: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
reference: Er zijn twee lichtbundels geplaatst die 's nachts omhoog schijnen.
translation: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.

source: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
reference: Er wordt momenteel aan vijf nieuwe wolkenkrabbers gebouwd, met een transportcentrum en een gedenkpark in het midden.
translation: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

source: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
reference: De PBS-show heeft meer dan twintig Emmy's gewonnen en ze zijn korter op de buis dan Mister Rogers' Neighborhood en Sesamstraat.
translation: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.

source: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
reference: Elke aflevering van het programma richtte zich op een thema uit een bepaald boek, waarna dat thema verder werd verkend door middel van meerdere verhalen.
translation: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.

source: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
reference: Elke show bevatte ook tips voor boeken die kinderen in hun bibliotheek konden vinden.
translation: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.

source: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
reference: John Grant van WNED Buffalo (het station van Reading Rainbow), zei: 'Reading Rainbow liet kinderen zien waarom ze moeten lezen... bracht hen de liefde voor lezen bij - [de show] spoorde kinderen aan om een boek te pakken en te gaan lezen.'
translation: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."

source: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
reference: Sommige mensen, zoals John Grant, geloven dat de serie aan haar eind is gekomen vanwege de financiële crisis en een verschuiving in de filosofie van educatieve televisieprogrammering.
translation: According to some, including John Grant, the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.

source: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
reference: De storm bevindt zich ongeveer 645 mijl (1040 km) ten westen van de Kaapverdische Eilanden en zal volgens voorspellers waarschijnlijk zijn uitgeraasd voor het vasteland wordt bedreigd.
translation: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.

source: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
reference: Momenteel bereikt Fred windsnelheden van 105 mijl per uur (165 km/u) en beweegt de strom zich in noordwestelijke richting.
translation: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.

source: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
reference: Fred is de sterkste tropische orkaan die sinds de komst van satellietbeelden ooit zo ver in het zuiden en oosten van de Atlantische oceaan is gemeten. Het is slechts de derde grote orkaan die ten oosten van 35°W is gemeten.
translation: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

source: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
reference: Op 24 september 1759 sloot Arthur Guinness een huurcontract van 9000 jaar voor de St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ierland.
translation: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.

source: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
reference: 250 jaar later is Guinness een wereldwijd bedrijf dat ieder jaar 10 miljard euro (US$ 14,7 miljard) omzet draait.
translation: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

source: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
reference: Jonny Reid, bijrijder van het A1GP-team van Nieuw-Zeeland, ging vandaag de geschiedenis boeken in door op legale manier de snelst tijd neer te zetten op de 48-jaar oude Auckland Harbour Bridge in Nieuw-Zeeland.
translation: Jonny Reid, driver of the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.

source: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
reference: Het lukte dhr. Reid om met Black Beauty, de A1GP-auto van Nieuw-Zeeland, maar liefst 7 keer met een snelheid van meer dan 160 km/u over de brug te rijden.
translation: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty, at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.

source: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
reference: De Nieuw-Zeelandse politie kon nauwelijks met hun lasergun vaststellen hoe snel de heer Reid ging, vanwege de lage wegligging van Black Beauty. De enige keer dat de politie het voor elkaar kreeg om de snelheid van de heer Reid vast te stellen, was toen hij het tempo terugbracht tot 160 km/u.
translation: Dutch text: The police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

source: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
reference: In de afgelopen 3 maanden zijn er meer dan 80 arrestanten uit de Central Booking-inrichting vrijgelaten zonder dat ze officieel zijn aangeklaagd.
translation: In the last 3 months, over 80 detainees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.

source: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
reference: In april van dit jaar heeft rechter Glynn een tijdelijk contactverbod tegen de faciliteit uitgevaardigd om zo de vrijlating van mensen af te dwingen die 24 uur na hun verbalisering nog werden vastgehouden en voor wie nog geen hoorzitting van een gerechtscommissaris mogelijk was.
translation: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.

source: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
reference: De commissaris bepaalt, indien van toepassing, de borgtocht en maakt de aanklachten formeel die zijn ingediend door de arresterende agent. De aanklachten worden vervolgens in het computersysteem van de staat ingevoerd, waarna de zaak wordt bijgehouden.
translation: Dutch text: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.

source: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
reference: Vanaf de hoorzitting heeft de verdachte ook recht op een snel proces.
translation: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect's right to a speedy trial.

source: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
reference: Peter Costello, de Australische minister van Financiën en de man die hoogstwaarschijnlijk premier John Howard zal opvolgen als liberale partijleider, is een groot voorstander van kernenergie in Australië.
translation: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.

source: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
reference: Meneer Costello zei dat Australië moet inzetten op het gebruik van kernenergie zodra dit economisch haalbaar is.
translation: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.

source: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
reference: 'Zodra het beschikbaar is voor de verkoop, moeten we het hebben. Dat wil zeggen dat er geen principieel bezwaar is tegen kernenergie,' aldus de heer Costello.
translation: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.

source: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
reference: Volgens Ansa 'was de politie bezorgd over een paar treffers op hoog niveau en vreesde dat hierdoor een regelrechte oorlog voor opvolging zou ontketenen.
translation: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession."

source: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
reference: De politie vertelde dat Lo Piccolo de overhand had, omdat hij in Palermo de rechterhand van Provenzano is geweest en zijn grotere ervaring hem het respect van de oudere generatie leiders opleverde, aangezien zij het beleid van Provenzano nastreefden om zich zo gedeisd mogelijk te houden, terwijl zij hun machtsnetwerk versterkten.
translation: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.

source: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
reference: Deze bazen waren door Provenzano beteugeld toen hij een einde maakte aan de door de Riina gedreven oorlog tegen de staat die het leven eiste van de maffiabestrijders Giovanni Falcone en Paolo Borsellino in 1992.'
translation: Dutch text: These bosses were reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992.

source: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
reference: Apple CEO Steve Jobs liep het podium op en haalde de iPhone uit zijn broekzak om het apparaat te onthullen.
translation: Apple CEO Steve Jobs walked onto the stage and took the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.

source: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
reference: Tijdens zijn twee uur durende speech zei hij dat 'Apple vandaag de telefoon opnieuw gaat uitvinden en we vandaag geschiedenis gaan schrijven'.
translation: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".

source: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
reference: Brazilië is het grootste rooms-katholieke land ter wereld en de rooms-katholieke kerk heeft zich consequent uitgesproken tegen het legaliseren van het homohuwelijk.
translation: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.

source: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
reference: In het Nationaal Congres van Brazilië werd 10 jaar lang een debat gevoerd over legalisatie. Op dit moment zijn dergelijke burgerlijke huwelijken alleen in Rio Grande do Sul legaal.
translation: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.

source: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
reference: Het originele voorstel was opgesteld door Marta Suplicy, de voormalig burgemeester van São Paulo. Het voorgestelde wetsvoorstel werd eerst gewijzigd en is nu in handen van Roberto Jefferson.
translation: Dutch text: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.

source: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
reference: De betogers hebben de hoop dat ze 1,2 miljoen handtekeningen kunnen verzamelen voor hun petitie, die ze vervolgens aan het Amerikaanse Nationale Congres willen overhandigen in november.
translation: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

source: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
reference: Toen bleek dat veel families juridische hulp zochten om huisuitzettingen te voorkomen, werd op 20 maart een bijeenkomst gehouden in het East Bay Community Law Center voor de slachtoffers van de fraude met woningen.
translation: After the housing scam became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.

source: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
reference: Toen de huurders deelden wat hen was overkomen, beseften de meeste families plotseling dat Carolyn Wilson van de OHA hun borg had gestolen en de stad was ontvlucht.
translation: Dutch text: When the tenants started sharing what had happened to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.

source: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
reference: De bewoners van Lockwood Gardens zijn bang dat er wellicht nog eens op zijn minst 40 gezinnen uit huis worden gezet, omdat men heeft vernomen dat de OHA-politie (Oakland Housing Authority) ook andere openbare woningen onderzoekt in Oakland die mogelijk betrokken zijn bij de huizenzwendel.
translation: Dutch text: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

source: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
reference: Het bandoptreden in het War Memorial Stadium in Maui, met naar verwachting 9000 toeschouwers, werd afgezegd, met verontschuldigingen van de band naar de fans.
translation: The band cancelled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was scheduled to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.

source: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
reference: Het management van de band, HK Management Inc. gaf geen expliciete reden op waarom 20 september gecanceld werd, maar een dag later zeiden ze dat het vanwege logistieke redenen was.
translation: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

source: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
reference: Vanwege de veroordeling voor omkoperij en corruptie zitten de bekende Griekse advocaten Sakis Kechagioglou en George Nikolakopoulos gevangen in de Atheense gevangenis van Korydallus.
translation: The famous Greek lawyers Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.

source: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
reference: Dit resulteerde in een groot schandaal binnen de juridische gemeenschap van Griekenland, waarbij illegale acties die de afgelopen jaren door rechters, juristen, notarissen en advocaten zijn gepleegd naar buiten kwamen.
translation: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.

source: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
reference: Een paar weken geleden, nadat journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos informatie publiceerde in zijn populaire televisieprogramma 'Zoungla' op Alpha TV, werd parlementslid en advocaat Petros Mantouvalos afgezet. De aanleiding was dat leden van zijn kantoor betrokken waren bij illegale omkoping en corruptie.
translation: Dutch text: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.

source: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
reference: ost of the buildings on the edges of the complex have beenToprechter Evangelos Kalousis zit daarnaast in de gevangenis omdat men hem schuldig heeft bevonden aan corruptie en ontaard gedrag.
translation: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.

source: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
reference: Roberts weigerde botweg om iets te zeggen over wanneer hij denkt dat het leven begint; een belangrijk vraagstuk wanneer je het hebt over de ethische kant van abortus. Hij stelde dat het onethisch zou zijn om iets te zeggen over de details van specifieke gevallen.
translation: Roberts, however, was firmly against saying that life begins when he believes it is important, a question that is important when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.

source: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
reference: Wel herhaalde hij zijn eerdere uitspraak dat Roe vs. Wade de 'vaste wet' was, waarbij hij aangaf hoe belangrijk het is dat de uitspraken van het Hooggerechtshof consequent zijn.
translation: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.

source: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
reference: Hij gaf ook aan dat hij geloofde in het onuitgesproken recht op privacy, waar de uitspraak over Roe van afhing.
translation: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.

source: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
reference: Maroochydore eindigde bovenaan met zes punten verschil van Noosa op de tweede plek.
translation: Maroochydore finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.

source: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
reference: De twee partijen ontmoetten elkaar in de grote halve finale, waar Noosa de tegenpartij de baas bleef met een verschil van 11 punten.
translation: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.

source: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
reference: Vervolgens werd in de halve finale Caboolture verslagen door Maroochydore.
translation: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.

source: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
reference: Hesperonychus elizabethae valt onder de Dromaeosauridae, een neef van de Velociraptor.
translation: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .

source: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
reference: Deze warmbloedige roofvogel die volledig gevederd is, zou naar verluid op twee poten rechtop hebben gelopen en zijn klauwen zouden hetzelfde zijn als die van de Velociraptor.
translation: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.

source: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
reference: De tweede klauw was groter, waardoor het de naam Hesperonychus kreeg, oftewel 'westerse klauw'.
translation: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw."

source: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
reference: Naast het brekende ijs, hebben ook extreme weersomstandigheden reddingsacties belemmerd.
translation: Besides the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.

source: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
reference: Pittman verklaarde dat de condities niet voor volgende week zouden verbeteren.
translation: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.

source: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
reference: Volgens Pittman is de hoeveelheid en de dikte van het pakijs nog nooit zo slecht geweest voor zeehondenjagers in de laatste vijftien jaar.
translation: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

source: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
reference: Vandaag bereikte Red Lake het nieuws dat er nog een leerling is gearresteerd in verband met de schietpartijen op 21 maart in de school. Op deze dag vond ook de begrafenis van Jeff Weise en drie van zijn negen slachtoffers plaats.
translation: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.

source: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
reference: De autoriteiten hebben geen officiële verklaring afgelegd naast de bevestiging van de arrestatie van vandaag.
translation: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.

source: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
reference: Maar een bron die het onderzoek kent, heeft de Minneapolis Star-Tribune verteld dat het om Louis Jourdain gaat, de 16-jarige zoon van Red Lake Tribal-voorzitter Floyd Jourdain.
translation: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.

source: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
reference: Op dit moment is nog niet bekend wat de aanklachten zijn of waarom de jongen door de autoriteiten is opgepakt, maar de jeugdprocedure is van start gegaan bij de federale rechtbank.
translation: Dutch text: No charges have yet been laid or what led authorities to the boy, but juvenile proceedings are under way in federal court.

source: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
reference: Ook vertelde Lodin dat ambtenaren hadden besloten de hertelling te stoppen om de Afghanen de kosten en het veiligheidsrisico van een nieuwe verkiezing te besparen.
translation: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.

source: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
reference: Diplomaten zeiden dat ze genoeg dubbelzinnigheid hadden gevonden in de Afghaanse grondwet, waardoor een tweede verkiezingsronde niet nodig was.
translation: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.

source: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
reference: Dit spreekt eerdere verslagen tegen dat het annuleren van de tweede verkiezingsronde ongrondwettelijk zou zijn.
translation: Dutch text: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

source: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
reference: Het luchtvaarttuig werd bestuurd door binnenlandse troepen en was op weg naar Irkoetsk.
translation: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.

source: An inquiry was established to investigate.
reference: Er wordt een onderzoek ingesteld.
translation: A probe was established to investigate.

source: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
reference: Sinds ongeveer 1970 is de Il-76 één van de belangrijkste onderdelen van eerst het Sovjetleger en nu ook het Russische leger, dit heeft vorige maand al tot een zwaar ongeval op Russisch gebied geleid.
translation: Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.

source: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
reference: Op 7 oktober liet de motor tijdens het opstijgen los. Er vielen geen gewonden. Rusland hield de Il-76s na dat ongeluk korte tijd aan de grond.
translation: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

source: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
reference: Ongeveer 800 mijl van de Trans-Alaska-pijpleiding is afgesloten nadat er duizenden vaten ruwe olie ten zuiden van Fairbanks in Alaska zijn gelekt.
translation: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

source: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
reference: Een stroomstoring na een routinematige brandbeveiligingstest zorgde voor een overstroming van de openingen van de ontlastingskleppen en ruwe olie in de buurt van het Fort Greely-pompstation 9.
translation: Dutch text: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.

source: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
reference: Door de opening van de kleppen is het systeem onder druk komen te staan en kon de olie op een pad stromen naar een tank met een capaciteit van 55.000 vaten (2,3 miljoen gallon).
translation: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).

source: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
reference: Op woensdagmiddag was er nog steeds een lekage in de tankventilatoren. Dit kwam waarschijnlijk door de thermische uitzetting in de tank.
translation: As of Wednesday afternoon, the vents of the tank still leaked probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.

source: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
reference: Een tweede beperkingsgebied onder de tanks dat tot 104.500 vaten kan opslaan, was nog niet volledig gevuld.
translation: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

source: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
reference: Met deze opmerkingen op livetelevisie gaven hoge Iraanse bronnen voor het eerst toe dat de sancties effect hadden.
translation: Comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.

source: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
reference: Dit zijn onder andere financiële beperkingen en een verbod op de export van ruwe olie, opgelegd door de Europese Unie. Meer dan 80% van de buitenlandse inkomsten van de Iraanse economie is afkomstig van deze export.
translation: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.

source: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
reference: In het meest recente rapport verklaarde OPEC dat de export van ruwe olie op het dieptepunt van de afgelopen twee decennia is beland met 2,8 miljoen vaten per dag.
translation: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.

source: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
reference: De hoogste leider de natie, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, heeft de afhankelijkheid van olie beschreven als 'een val' die al voor de islamitische revolutie van Iran in 1979 is opgezet er waaruit het land zich moet bevrijden.
translation: Dutch: The country's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.

source: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
reference: Mensen in Noord-Californië, Oregon, Nevada en Utah krijgen waarschijnlijk een behoorlijke lichtshow voorgeschoteld als de capsule rond 5 uur 's ochtends (oostelijke tijd) de atmosfeer van de aarde binnendringt.
translation: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.

source: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
reference: De capsule heeft erg veel weg van een vallende ster die door de lucht schiet.
translation: The capsule will look much like a star going across the sky.

source: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
reference: De capsule reist met een snelheid van 12,8 km of 8 mijl per seconde, waarmee de afstand tussen San Francisco en Los Angeles in één minuut zou worden overbrugd.
translation: The capsule will travel at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.

source: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
reference: Stardust wordt het snelste ruimtevaartuig dat terugkeert naar de aarde. Het vaartuig vestigt een nieuw record en breekt daarmee het oude record dat dateert van mei 1969, toen de Apollo X-commandomodule terugkeerde naar de aarde.
translation: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.

source: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
reference: 'Het zal zich verplaatsen over de westkust van Noord-Californië en via centraal Oregon, Nevada en Idaho naar Utah de lucht van Californië verlichten,' aldus Tom Duxbury, projectmanager van Stardust.
translation: "That will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah," Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

source: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
reference: Mr. Rudds besluit om het klimaatakkoord van Kyoto te ondertekenen, betekent dat de Verenigde Staten het enige ontwikkelde land is dat de overeenkomst niet heeft ondertekend.
translation: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.

source: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
reference: De vroegere conservatieve regering in Australië weigerde het Verdrag van Kyoto te ondertekenen, omdat het de economie schade zou toebrengen, vanwege de zware afhankelijkheid van de steenkoolexport, terwijl landen als China en India zich niet aan de emissiedoelstellingen hoefden te houden.
translation: Dutch text: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

source: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
reference: Dit is de grootste overname sinds het begin van eBay.
translation: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.

source: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
reference: Het bedrijf is van plan zijn winstbronnen diverser te maken en de populariteit op te vijzelen in landen waar Skype sterk aanwezig is, zoals China, Oost-Europa en Brazilië.
translation: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

source: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
reference: Wetenschappers vermoeden dat Enceladus geologisch actief is en ze hebben het vermoeden dat het een potentiële bron is van de ijskoude E-ring van Saturnus.
translation: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.

source: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
reference: Enceladus is het meest reflecterende object in het zonnestelsel en weerkaatst ongeveer 90 procent van het zonlicht.
translation: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.

source: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
reference: Volgens een Japanse krant van vandaag heeft gamefabrikant Konami besloten de game Six Days in Fallujah niet uit te brengen.
translation: Konami today announced that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.

source: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
reference: De game is gebaseerd op de Tweede Slag bij Fallujah, waarbij er een heftige strijd plaatsvond tussen Amerikaanse en Irakese troepen.
translation: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.

source: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
reference: Omdat de video niet op de website van Big Brother is opgeslagen, stelde ACMA bovendien dat Big Brother geen inbreuk heeft gemaakt op online content censuurwetten, ondanks het feit dat de video werd gestreamd op het internet.
translation: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.

source: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
reference: De Radio- en televisiewet reguleert de inhoud op het internet, maar om als internetinhoud te worden beschouwd, moet de inhoud fysiek op een server zijn opgeslagen.
translation: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

source: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
reference: Er werd door de Amerikaanse ambassade in Nairobi, Kenia, een waarschuwing gegeven voor 'extremisten uit Somalië' die van plan zijn in Kenia en Ethiopië zelfmoordaanslagen te plegen.
translation: The United States embassy in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.

source: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
reference: De VS zegt dat ze informatie hebben ontvangen van een geheime bron over zelfmoordterroristen die belangrijke bezienswaardigheden in Ethiopië en Kenia op willen blazen.
translation: Dutch text: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.

source: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
reference: Heck en Johnson hadden al in 1988, toen ze aan UW studeerden en The Daily Show en The Colbert Report nog lang niet bestonden, een idee voor een parodie van nieuws en nieuwsverslagen.
translation: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.

source: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
reference: Sinds de oprichting van The Onion is het een heus imperium van parodieën op het nieuws geworden met een gedrukte versie, een website die in oktober 5.000.000 unieke bezoekers wist te trekken, persoonlijke advertenties, een 24-uursnieuwsnetwerk, podcasts en een onlangs gepubliceerde atlas: Our Dumb World.
translation: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

source: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
reference: Al Gore en generaal Tommy Franks vertellen wat hun favoriete krantenkoppen zijn (die van Gore is er een van The Onion, waarin wordt gemeld dat hij en Tipper de beste seks van hun leven hebben gehad na zijn nederlaag van het kiescollege in 2000).
translation: Dutch text: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).

source: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
reference: Een groot aantal van hun schrijvers heeft de parodieprogramma's over het nieuws van Jon Stewart en Stephen Colbert sterk beïnvloed.
translation: Many of their writers have gone on to influence Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

source: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
reference: Het artistieke evenement is ook een onderdeel van een campagne die wordt gevoerd door het stadhuis van Boekarest. Het doel is om het imago van de Roemeense hoofdstad nieuw leven in te blazen als creatieve en kleurrijke metropool.
translation: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.

source: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
reference: De stad zal de eerste in het zuidoosten van Europa zijn waar de CowParade wordt gehouden: 's werelds grootste openbare kunstevenement tussen juni en augustus van dit jaar.
translation: The city will host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

source: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
reference: De mededeling van vandaag was ook een uitbreiding van de toezegging die de overheid eerder dit jaar in maart deed om extra rijbanen te realiseren.
translation: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March this year to fund extra carriages.

source: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
reference: Tel daarbij nog eens 300 op, waardoor er in totaal 1.300 rijtuigen moeten worden toegevoegd om de overbevolking te verlichten.
translation: A further 300 carriages will be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

source: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
reference: Christopher Garcia, woordvoerder van het Los Angeles Police Department, zei dat de mannelijke verdachte wordt onderzocht vanwege het betreden van verboden terrein in plaats van vanwege vandalisme.
translation: Christopher Garcia, a spokesman of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.

source: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".
reference: Fysiek was het bord niet beschadigd; er werd gebruik gemaakt van zwarte dekzeilen die waren versierd met vredestekens en hartjes om de 'O' in een kleine letter 'e' te veranderen.
translation: The sign was not damaged physically; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".

source: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
reference: Het rode getij wordt veroorzaakt door een grotere concentratie Karenia brevis dan normaal, een eencellig marien organisme dat hier natuurlijk voorkomt.
translation: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.

source: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
reference: Omdat natuurlijke factoren met elkaar kunnen interfereren, zorgen ze voor optimale omstandigheden, waardin het aantal algen drastisch kan toenemen.
translation: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.

source: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
reference: Het zenuwgif dat de alg produceert, is in staat de zenuwen bij zowel mensen als vissen uit te uitschakelen.
translation: Dutch text: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.

source: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
reference: Vissen sterven vaak vanwege de hoge concentratie giftige stoffen in het water.
translation: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.

source: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
reference: Mensen kunnen worden besmet door het inademen van water dat door de wind en golven in de lucht terechtkomt.
translation: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

source: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .
reference: De tropische orkaan Gonu is vernoemd naar een zak met palmbladeren in de taal van de Malediven en bereikte op zijn hoogtepunt een aanhoudende wind van 240 kilometer per uur (149 mijl per uur).
translation: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .

source: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
reference: Eerder op de dag waren er windsnelheden van 83 km/u en er werd verwacht dat de windkracht zou blijven afnemen.
translation: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expected to keep weakening.

source: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
reference: Als gevolg van COVID-19 werd door de National Basketball Association (NBA) van de Verenigde Staten afgelopen woensdag het professionele basketbalseizoen opgeschort.
translation: Dutch: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.

source: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
reference: De beslissing van de NBA werd genomen nadat een speler van Utah Jazz positief testte voor het COVID-19-virus.
translation: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

source: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.
reference: Dit fossiel wijst erop dat de splitsing veel eerder heeft plaatsgevonden dan op basis van het moleculaire bewijs valt te verwachten.
translation: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.

source: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
reference: 'Dat betekent dat alles verder terug in de tijd worden geplaatst,' zei Berhane Asfaw, onderzoeker van de Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopië en medeauteur van het onderzoek.
translation: "That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.

source: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.
reference: AOL wordt in de Verenigde Staten wijdverspreid gebruikt en daarom heeft het bedrijf de IM-markt in zijn eigen tempo kunnen bewegen.
translation: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.

source: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.
reference: Deze overeenkomst kan het einde van deze vrijheid betekenen.
translation: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.

source: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
reference: Het gecombineerde aantal gebruikers van de diensten van Yahoo! en Microsoft kan wedijveren met het aantal klanten van AOL.
translation: The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

source: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.
reference: In navolging van de openbaarmaking dat de bank in 2008 noodhulp had gekregen van de Britse regering, is de Northern Rock-bank genationaliseerd.
translation: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.

source: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.
reference: Northern Rock had steun nodig omdat de bank te maken kreeg met de risicovolle hypotheekcrisis in 2007.
translation: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.

source: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.
reference: De Virgin Group van Sir Richard Branson deed een bod op de bank, maar dit werd afgewezen voordat de bank werd genationaliseerd.
translation: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank's nationalisation.

source: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).
reference: Tijdens de nationalisering splitste topbank Northern Rock plc zich in 2010 af van de 'slechte bank' Northern Rock (Asset Management).
translation: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).

source: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
reference: Virgin Group heeft niet de vermogensbeheerder gekocht, maar alleen de 'goede bank' Northern Rock.
translation: Virgin only bought Northern Rock's ‘good bank’, not the asset management company.

source: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
reference: Er wordt algemeen aangenomen dat dit de vijfde keer in de geschiedenis is dat mensen een chemische bevestiging hebben gekregen dat materiaal van mars op aarde terechtkomt.
translation: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.

source: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.
reference: Van de ongeveer 24.000 bekende meteorieten die op aarde zijn gevallen, zijn er maar een stuk of 34 waarvan we weten dat ze van Mars komen.
translation: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.

source: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.
reference: Vijftien van deze stenen maakte onderdeel uit van de meteorenregen van afgelopen juli.
translation: Twenty-five of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.

source: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
reference: De rotsen zijn zeer zeldzaam op aarde en enkele zijn verkocht voor prijzen van tussen 11.000 en 22.500 Amerikaanse dollars per ons, ongeveer het tienvoudige van de goudprijs.
translation: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

source: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.
reference: Na deze race heeft Keselowski 2250 punten en staat daarmee nog steeds vooraan in het coureurkampioenschap.
translation: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.

source: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.
reference: Op zeven punten achterstand staat Johnson op de tweede plaats met 2.243.
translation: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.

source: In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.
reference: Hamlin staat met twintig punten achterstand op de derde plaats. Hij staat overigens wel vijf punten voor op Bowyer. Kahne en Truex Jr. staan op de vijfde en zesde plaats met respectievelijk 2.220 en 2.207 punten.
translation: Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.

source: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
reference: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth en Harvick sluiten de top-tien posities af voor het Drivers' Championship met nog vier races te gaan in het seizoen.
translation: Steward, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

source: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.
reference: Ook de Amerikaanse marine gaf aan een onderzoek in te stellen naar het voorval.
translation: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.

source: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".
reference: Ook zeiden ze in een verklaring: 'De bemanning is momenteel bezig met vaststellen wat de beste manier is om het schip veilig te bevrijden.'
translation: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".

source: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.
reference: De mijnenveger van Avengerklasse was onderweg naar Puerto Princesa in Palawan.
translation: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.

source: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
reference: Het is toegewezen aan de Zevende Vloot van de Amerikaanse Marine met als basis Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
translation: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.

source: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
reference: De aanvallers in Mumbai kwamen op 26 november 2008 aan per boot, hadden granaten en automatische wapens bij zich en troffen meerdere doelwitten. Enkele getroffen doelwitten zijn het drukke treinstation Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus en het beroemde Taj Mahal Hotel.
translation: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.

source: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.
reference: Dankzij het feit dat David Headly op verkenning ging en informatie verzamelde, konden de 10 schutters van de Pakistaanse militantengroep Laskhar-e-Taiba overgaan tot actie.
translation: Dutch text: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.

source: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
reference: De aanval heeft de relatie tussen India en Pakistan onder druk gezet.
translation: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

source: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.
reference: Terwijl hij vergezeld werd door ambtenaren, verzekerde hij de inwoners van Texas ervan dat er stappen ondernomen werden ter bescherming van de publieke veiligheid.
translation: The following text was accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.

source: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."
reference: Perry zei nadrukkelijk dat 'er een aantal plekken in de wereld zijn die beter uitgerust zijn om dit soort uitdagingen aan te gaan.'
translation: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."

source: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."
reference: De gouverneur zei ook 'dat we vandaag ontdekt hebben dat ook schoolgaande kinderen contact hebben gehad met de patiënt.'
translation: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."

source: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."
reference: Hij ging verder met geruststellen en zei: 'Deze zaak nemen we serieus op. Wees gerust, ons systeem werkt zoals het zou moeten werken.'
translation: He went on: "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."

source: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.
reference: Als dit klopt, is de Musashi eindelijk gevonden nadat Allen er acht jaar lang naar had gezocht.
translation: If confirmed, the search completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.

source: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.
reference: Het wrak werd gevonden met behulp van zeebodemkaarten en een ROV.
translation: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.

source: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
reference: Als één van 's werelds rijkste mensen heeft Allen naar verluidt veel van zijn rijkdom in maritiem onderzoek gestoken en is vanwege zijn levenslange interesse in de oorlog een zoektocht begonnen naar de Musashi.
translation: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

source: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.
reference: Ze werd tijdens haar verblijf in Atlanta door de critici toegejuicht vanwege haar innovatieve stedelijk onderwijs.
translation: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.

source: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.
reference: Ze werd benoemd tot de nationale hoofdopzichter van 2009.
translation: In 2009 she was awarded the title of Superintendent of the Year.

source: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.
reference: Tegen de tijd dat de prijs werd uitgereikt, zagen scholen in Atlanta veel verbetering in de cijfers.
translation: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.

source: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.
